title: Smart Fitting Room
description: Pilot launch of interactive fitting experience
credits: As part of Random Studio (client NDA)
lede: As part of Digital Retail Experience team at Random Studio, I launched Smart Fitting Room pilot in two stores in Europe.

text.heading: Insight
text.text: Most of the traditional fitting rooms are generic and uninviting spaces. They can be time-consuming and frustrating, as customers often struggle to find the right size or style.

text.heading: Idea
text.text: With integrated technologies such as RFID, controlled lighting and motion sensors, smart fitting room can provide a seamless shopping experience to aid clients in the search for their perfect fit, leading to increased conversion and sales for the retailer.
